name: Commando Counter Attack War 3D
description:
You have been waiting for big power machine so enjoy the commando counter attack war 3d. A big and heavy gunner is for you to fight against hazard of terrorist using simple guns AK-47, M5 or others but your FPS commando have the high range gunner machine. Make the city safe from enemies while killing all before moving to the next mission. Gunner troops is the high range shooter with multiple bullets. Enemies are so trained and they are hidden behind the obstacles. You are more powerful as compared to enemy gangster so conquer all the territory and be the hero of your nation. Shoot down the helicopter and make their worst strike failure.
The army troops have provided you the high quality weapons as you deserve. So you have to destroy every striker who threaten our nation security in this attacking war 3d. Terrorist are everywhere and they have the complete deadly mission to attack this innocent city. This is the fully dangerous mission but not an impossible mission. Pick up your weapons and judge the battlefield for proper planned attack on their terrorist attack. Enemies will run towards you due to your gunner fire so prepare for their attack. Defeat the terrible fighter while fighting in this special gunner commando attack. Beware of the gunship helicopter fire. You have two deadly enemies on the Earth and from the air attack.
Your military soldier machine gun fighter have to kill the warrior gang and craft air fighter. Only your accurate fire will convert the terrorist into dead. Prove yourself as a stone wall against aggressive invaders. Finish off the enemy crazy criminals gang to save your city. Modern gunner weapon is for you for better attack and feeling hopeful to win this territory battle. Enemy waves are most active and fearlessly with this gunner firepower. Your success is into accurate fire, superb shooting aim without wasting your time & power. Shoot down to eliminate the rival enemies and destroy their wings. Your enemies are nothing in front of your powerful gunner modern attacking machine.
Your duty is to perform this secret mission as hurry as you can. Dominate the terrorist from start of the battle war to complete this mission on time. Show you the anti criminal terrorist skills to prove you the boss of the gunner modern machine warrior. You got the call of this scattered rival attack. Commando gunner counter will always ready for counter terrorism. Shoot your invaders and choppers to save the nation. Enemies have low power guns as compared to you but they are more in numbers so that is a tough job to kill one by one.
